metadata.title: CVE-2020-26411 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A potential DOS vulnerability was discovered in all versions of Gitlabstarting from 13.4.x (>=13.4 to <13.4.7, >=13.5 to <13.5.5, and >=13.6 to<13.6.2). Using a specific query name for a project search can causestatement timeouts that can lead to a potential DOS if abused.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
